title: Ingest YouTube transcripts into Signal Records
description: Add transcript retrieval/storage for YouTube videos so evaluation and retrieval use actual spoken content, not only titles/excerpts.
close_reason: Implemented YouTube transcript ingestion pipeline (video ID extraction, timedtext fetch/parsing, transcript storage fields, source indexer integration, and tests).

title: Configure SOUP_WEB_ORIGINS for cookie auth
description: Set SOUP_WEB_ORIGINS in the worker environment to the web app origin(s) (comma-separated) so credentialed CORS works for auth/session and kitchen.

title: Automate Signal Record v1 evaluation scoring workflow
description: Replace manual yes/no scoring with a repeatable script or endpoint that runs the 10-question evaluation and outputs useful/cited/trustworthy metrics.
close_reason: Added automated Signal Record v1 evaluation CLI, output reports/scorecards, transcript input support, and docs/runbook updates.

title: Design trustworthiness ranking signals for serve results
description: Define and implement trust-signal inputs (views, likes, shares, authority, engagement) for ranking recommendations in kitchen serve. Include schema changes, weighting strategy, and evaluation plan.

title: Fix worker typecheck errors in health/owner tests
description: pnpm build fails because apps/worker typecheck reports TS18046: 'json' is of type 'unknown' in src/routes/health.test.ts and src/routes/owner.test.ts. Update tests to type the response json or add proper typing helpers so typecheck passes.

title: Exclude YouTube Shorts from index and purge existing shorts
close_reason: Implemented shorts URL filter hardening, added tests, cleaned local+remote D1 shorts rows, and deployed worker.

title: Implement RSS transcript parsing for podcasts
description: Parse transcript fields/links from podcast RSS feeds when available and persist into soup content records for retrieval and evaluation.

title: Fix broken web test import path
description: pnpm --filter @soup/web test fails in apps/web/tests/index.test.ts because it imports ./index.vue, which does not exist relative to the test file. Update the import to the correct page/component path and make the web tests pass.
close_reason: Fixed web test import path and updated stale assertions/mocks for current index page behavior. pnpm test now passes.

Exit status 1 currently fails in  because it imports , which does not exist relative to the test file. Update the import to the correct page/component path and make the web tests pass.

title: Improve transcript provider reliability when YouTube timedtext is empty
description: Current YouTube transcript ingestion is best-effort via timedtext and may return empty payloads in some environments. Add fallback provider(s) or watch-page/Innertube transcript extraction to increase transcript coverage.

title: Improve useful-score heuristics for Signal Record eval
description: Current auto-eval returns low useful scores on broad questions. Improve ranking/scoring (topic clustering, creator consistency, recency weighting, contradiction detection).
close_reason: Upgraded auto-eval with intent-aware ranking, recency weighting, creator consistency/diversity signals, contradiction checks, and improved useful-score thresholds.
